00122 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES()\
00123   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00124   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(iaszoneState, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ZONE_STATE_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_8BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID),\
00125   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(iaszoneType, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_16BIT_ENUM_DATA_TYPE_ID),\
00126   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(iaszoneStatus, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ZONE_STATUS_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_16BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID),\
00127   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(iasCieAddress, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ZONE_IAS_CIE_ADDRESS_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_U64BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID),\
00128   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(iasZoneId, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ZONE_ID_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID),\
00129   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(iasZoneNumberOfZoneSensitivityLevelsSupported, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_NUMBEROFZONESENSITIVITY_LEVEL_SUPP_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID,0x02, 0xFF),\
00130   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(iasZoneCurrentZoneSensitivityLevel, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_CURRENTZONESENSITIVITY_LEVEL_SUPP_ID,  ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)\
00131     
00132 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \
00133   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)
00134     
00135 #define IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00136   { \
00137     .id = IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00138     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},\
00139     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,\
00140     .attributes = (uint8_t *) (clattributes),\
00141     .commandsAmount = ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,\
00142     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00143   }
00144 
00145 #define IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)\
00146   { \
00147     .id = IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00148     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},\
00149     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,\
00150     .attributes = (uint8_t *) (clattributes),\
00151     .commandsAmount = ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,\
00152     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00153   }
00154 
00155 #define DEFINE_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands)\
00156     IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes,clcommands)
00157

00162 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(zoneStatusChangeNotificationCommandInd, zoneEnrollRequestCommandInd, zoneEnrollResponseInd, zoneInitiateNormalOperatingModeInd, zoneInitiateTestModeInd)\
00163     DEFINE_COMMAND(zoneStatusChangeNotificationCommand, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_STATUS_CHANGE_NOTIFY_COMMAND_ID,\
00164                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00165                      zoneStatusChangeNotificationCommandInd),\
00166     DEFINE_COMMAND(zoneEnrollRequestCommand, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_ENROLL_REQUEST_COMMAND_ID,\
00167                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00168                      zoneEnrollRequestCommandInd),\
00169     DEFINE_COMMAND(zoneEnrollResCommand, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_ENROLL_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID,\
00170                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00171                      zoneEnrollResponseInd),\
00172     DEFINE_COMMAND(zoneInitiateNormalOperatingMode, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_NORMAL_OPERATIONG_MODE,\
00173                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00174                      zoneInitiateNormalOperatingModeInd),\
00175     DEFINE_COMMAND(zoneInitiateTestMode, ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TEST_MODE,\
00176                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00177                      zoneInitiateTestModeInd)\

00182 BEGIN_PACK
00187 typedef enum{
00188   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_STANDARD_CIE                  = 0x0000,
00189   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_MOTION_SENSOR                 = 0x000d,
00190   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_CONTACT_SWITCH                = 0x0015,
00191   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_FIRE_SENSOR                   = 0x0028,
00192   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_WATER_SENSOR                  = 0x002A,
00193   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_GAS_SENSOR                    = 0x002B,
00194   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_PER_EMER_DEVICE               = 0x002C,
00195   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_VIBRATION_MOVEMENT_SENSOR     = 0x002D,
00196   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_REMOTE_CONTROL                = 0x010F,
00197   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_KEY_FOB                       = 0x0115,
00198   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_KEY_PAD                       = 0x021D,
00199   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_STANDARD_WARNING_DEVICE       = 0x0225,
00200   ZCL_IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ZONE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_INVALID_ZONE                  = 0xFFFF
00201 }ZCL_ZoneType_t;
00202 
00206 typedef enum {
00207   ENROLL_RESP_SUCCESS               =  0x00,
00208   ENROLL_RESP_NOT_SUPPORTED         =  0x01,
00209   ENROLL_RESP_NOT_ENROLL_PERMIT     =  0x02,
00210   ENROLL_RESP_TOO_MANY_ZONES        =  0x03
00211 }ZCL_ZoneStatus_t;
00212 
00213 typedef struct PACK {
00214     struct PACK
00215   {
00216     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00217     uint8_t             type;
00218     uint8_t             properties;
00219     uint16_t            value;
00220   } clusterVersion;
00221 
00222   struct PACK {
00223     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00224     uint8_t type;
00225     uint8_t properties;
00226     uint8_t value;
00227   } iaszoneState;
00228 
00229   struct PACK {
00230     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00231     uint8_t type;
00232     uint8_t properties;
00233     uint16_t value;
00234   } iaszoneType;
00235 
00236   struct PACK {
00237     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00238     uint8_t type;
00239     uint8_t properties;
00240     uint16_t value;
00241   } iaszoneStatus;
00242 
00243   struct PACK {
00244     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00245     uint8_t type;
00246     uint8_t properties;
00247     uint64_t value;
00248   } iasCieAddress;
00249 
00250   struct PACK {
00251     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00252     uint8_t type;
00253     uint8_t properties;
00254     uint8_t value;
00255   } iasZoneId;
00256 
00257   struct PACK {
00258     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00259     uint8_t type;
00260     uint8_t properties;
00261     uint8_t value;
00262     uint8_t minVal;
00263     uint8_t maxVal;
00264   } iasZoneNumberOfZoneSensitivityLevelsSupported;
00265 
00266   struct PACK {
00267     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00268     uint8_t type;
00269     uint8_t properties;
00270     uint8_t value;
00271   } iasZoneCurrentZoneSensitivityLevel;
00272 } ZCL_IasZoneClusterServerAttributes_t;
00273 
00274 typedef struct PACK
00275 {
00276   struct PACK
00277   {
00278     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00279     uint8_t             type;
00280     uint8_t             properties;
00281     uint16_t            value;
00282   } clusterVersion;
00283 } ZCL_IasZoneClusterClientAttributes_t;

00285 END_PACK

00287 BEGIN_PACK
00291 //Zone Status Change Structure
00292 typedef struct PACK
00293 {
00294   uint16_t zoneStatus;
00295   uint8_t extendedStatus;
00296   uint8_t zoneId;
00297   uint16_t delayTime;
00298 } ZCL_ZoneStatusChangeNot_t;
00299 
00300 //Zone Enroll Request Structure
00301 typedef struct PACK
00302 {
00303   uint16_t zoneType;
00304   uint16_t manufacturerCode;
00305 } ZCL_ZoneEnrollRequest_t;
00306 
00307 //Zone Enroll Response Structure
00308 typedef struct PACK
00309 {
00310   uint8_t enrollResponseCode;
00311   uint8_t zoneId;
00312 } ZCL_ZoneEnrollResCommand_t;
00313 
00314 //Zone Zone Table Structure
00315 typedef struct PACK
00316 {
00317   uint8_t  zoneId;
00318   uint16_t zoneType;
00319   uint16_t zoneStatus;
00320   uint64_t zoneAddress;
00321 } ZCL_ZoneTable_t;
00322 
00323 //Zone Test Mode Structure
00324 typedef struct PACK
00325 {
00326   uint8_t testmodeDuration;
00327   uint8_t currentZoneSensitivityLevel;
00328 }ZCL_ZoneInitiateTestMode_t;
00329 END_PACK

00331 // IAS Zone Cluster Commands
00332 typedef struct
00333 {
00334   struct
00335   {
00336     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00337     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00338     ZCL_Status_t(*zoneEnrollRequestCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_ZoneEnrollRequest_t *payload);
00339   } zoneEnrollRequestCommand;
00340   
00341   struct
00342   {
00343     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00344     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00345     ZCL_Status_t(*zoneEnrollResCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_ZoneEnrollResCommand_t *payload);
00346   } zoneEnrollResCommand;
00347 
00348   struct
00349   {
00350     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00351     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00352     ZCL_Status_t(*zoneStatusChangeNotificationCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_ZoneStatusChangeNot_t *payload);
00353   } zoneStatusChangeNotificationCommand;
00354   
00355   struct
00356   {
00357     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00358     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00359     ZCL_Status_t(*zoneInitiateNormalOperatingMode)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing);
00360   } zoneInitiateNormalOperatingMode;
00361   
00362   struct
00363   {
00364     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00365     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00366     ZCL_Status_t(*zoneInitiateTestMode)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_ZoneInitiateTestMode_t *payload);
00367   } zoneInitiateTestMode;
00368 } ZCL_IasZoneClusterCommands_t;
